channel.title: How do i remove the weather
channel.description: its snowing on my server and storm... how can i remove this ? plz help

thanks but he needed help so i gave him alll help

item.title: How do i remove the weather
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“legendzpker, post:4, topic:64210”][center][size=10pt]Don’t like that snow? The dense fog covering your screen?
Dislike to restart each weather change?[/size][/center]

Purpose: ^

Difficulty: Easy - Really short

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and Paste

Server Base: PimpScape, any server with weather - I used a default PimpScape

Class Modified: Client.java

Procedure:
Step 1:
First, find:

public static int Weather[] = {1,1,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,5};

Step 2:
Second, replace with mines:

public static int Weather[] = {3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3};

Done :).
Clear skies.

Credits: 100% me
im fed up beting u all at tut making lolz have fun with no weather.

post if helped[/quote]

that should be in tuts section not here -.-

Read full topic
item.source: How do i remove the weather

item.title: How do i remove the weather
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

[center][size=10pt]Don’t like that snow? The dense fog covering your screen?
Dislike to restart each weather change?[/size][/center]

Purpose: ^

Difficulty: Easy - Really short

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and Paste

Server Base: PimpScape, any server with weather - I used a default PimpScape

Class Modified: Client.java

Procedure:
Step 1:
First, find:

public static int Weather[] = {1,1,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,5};

Step 2:
Second, replace with mines:

public static int Weather[] = {3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3};

Done :).
Clear skies.

Credits: 100% me
im fed up beting u all at tut making lolz have fun with no weather.
